quotes.author: Will Smith
quotes.quote: Greatness exists in all of us.

quotes.author: Will Smith
quotes.quote: Being realistic is the most common path to mediocrity.

quotes.author: Will Smith
quotes.quote: And where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy’s sleeping? I’m working.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: If you love live, don't waste time.  For time is what life is made up of.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.

quotes.author: The Rock
quotes.quote: One of the most important things you can accomplish is just being yourself.

quotes.author: The Rock
quotes.quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Always be humble and hungry.

quotes.author: The Rock
quotes.quote: When life puts you in tough situations, don’t say “Why Me?” Just say “Try Me.

quotes.author: Jackie Chan
quotes.quote: Do not let circumstances control you. You change your circumstances.

quotes.author: Jackie Chan
quotes.quote: Now I am older, I understand we have to accept who we are.

quotes.author: Jackie Chan
quotes.quote: Life will knock us down, but we can choose whether or not to stand back up.

quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg
quotes.quote: I’ve always wanted to do right in life. But the wanting and the doing aren’t quite the same thing.

quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg
quotes.quote: If you become complacent, you start feeling entitled.

quotes.author: Mark Wahlberg
quotes.quote: You know you have two choices in life, basically, to succeed or to fail.
